Author: intertropical
Text: This is so relatable :/ I’m now “weight restored”, and in fact have overshot... my hunger levels are naturally going down but now I just want to artificially “help it along” because it’s easier to restrict. But every time I even try to do that I start bingeing again lol.   Gotta remember that recovery/weight restoration is difficult as fuck, and there’s a good reason that we embarked on this good fight. By actively challenging the “weight loss!!!111!” thoughts and not restricting, our brains *will* form different thought patterns and mindsets. Stay strong, sending love <3
